name: Bouncing Babies
description:
In 1980, Nintendo released a handheld game called Fire using their Game & Watch platform. 

in 1984, Dave Baskin created a remake of that game called Bouncing Babies and released on MS-DOS. 

This game is a remake of that Bouncing Babies created for A Copycat Themed gamejam!

Babies are being tossed out of a burning building, your job is to safely bounce them to an ambulance waiting near by!  You can use AD or Left/Right arrows to move your firemen.  Alternatively you can also use 123 to position them!
